triples.name: Reachability analysis
triples.relevance: The paper proposes set-based reachability analysis as a novel combination with convex optimization for trajectory planning.

triples.name: Motion planning
triples.relevance: Motion planning is the core problem that the paper addresses through a novel approach combining reachability analysis and optimization.

triples.name: Trajectory optimization
triples.relevance: Trajectory planning/optimization is the specific technique combined with reachability analysis in the proposed approach.

triples.name: Self-driving car
triples.relevance: Automated vehicles are the application domain for which the trajectory planning approach is designed and validated.

triples.name: Convex optimization
triples.relevance: Convex optimization is explicitly mentioned as a key technique combined with reachability analysis in the novel approach.

triples.name: Benchmark (computing)
triples.relevance: The CommonRoad benchmark suite is used to demonstrate and validate the benefits of the proposed motion planner.
